upgrades.rationale: Minimal investment to begin Level 2 path. Gold stat increases future income potential. Maritime faction matches Admiral Stormwind courtier for future promotion.

strategic_reasoning: CONSERVATIVE WEALTH PRESERVATION STRATEGY: I am leading with 47 VP. Player 3 has 43 VP, Player 1 has 34 VP. My primary constraint is GOLD - I only have 1 gold, and promotions cost minimum 3 gold. Guildmaster Harrow is already Level 2 and eligible for promotion to Trade Commissioner Vale (which I control), but I cannot afford the 3 gold cost. Spending 5 VP to upgrade another agent would drop me to 42 VP, putting me BEHIND Player 3's 43 VP. This is unacceptable. Instead, I invest only 1 VP to begin upgrading First Mate Calico, maintaining my lead at 46 VP while positioning for future Maritime promotions. Cycle 2 priority: ACCUMULATE GOLD through abilities, then execute promotions at Cycle 2 transition when I have 3+ gold stockpiled. The economic engine must be fed gold before promotions can proceed. Patience is profit.

cycle_2_plan.rationale: Use gold-generating abilities every turn in Cycle 2. First Mate Calico gives 3 gold on Turn 2, Alchemist Brynn gives 4 gold on Turn 3. Target 8+ gold by Cycle 2 transition for dual promotions.
